name: esbuild_custom
description: Barebones esbuild and test node server implementation. For building

scripts.dev: npm run pip && npm i --save-dev concurrently && npm i --save-dev nodemon && npm run concurrent
scripts.pip: "pip install quart" && "pip install websockets" && "pip install logging"
scripts.pwa: npm i workbox-cli && workbox generateSW bundler/pwa/workbox-config.js && npm run build && npm start
